Your Medical Records, Simplified

Access your health records instantly and securely, with Fasten Connect. Your medical data is now
always at your fingertips—no more waiting for faxes or paper forms.

With connections to the largest health systems & payers, like:
How Fasten Health
Works for Patients
01
Search for Your Provider or Health Plan
Find your provider or health plan from Fasten Connect's network of healthcare endpoints.
02
Authenticate and Grant Access
Use your existing provider or health plan credentials to authenticate and give consent for data sharing.
03
Instant Access to Your Data
Fasten Connect pulls and standardizes health data in real- time, making it available in FHIR format.

Your Health Records, Fully
Managed

With Fasten Connect, you can access a variety of important records:

EHRs

Allergies

Records of harmful reactions to
substances or allergens.

Medications

Prescribed medications with
details on dosages and frequency.

Immunizations

A history of vaccinations
administered by healthcare providers.

Labs

Your test results, tracking health
status over time.

Vitals

A summary of recurring health
data like blood pressure.

Clinical Notes

Notes from doctors, nurses, and
other healthcare providers.

Problems & Procedures

Findings from check-ups, exams,
and medical treatments

Care Team & Care Plan

Suggestions and next steps for
your health journey.

Easy Data Sharing

Smart Sharing

Share health records securely with doctors, schools, or family.

Send a Private Link

Share temporary access to your data with trusted contacts.

Download PDF

Get a consolidated PDF of your records to share with your care team.

Add to iOS Wallet

Store vaccination records on your iPhone for easy access.

Who We Serve

Patients
Payers
Providers
Developers
Researchers

Why Choose Fasten Connect?

Instant Access

Access your records in real time from 30,000+ healthcare systems

Security & Compliance

HIPAA-compliant and secure, making sure your data is protected.

Total Control

You decide who gets access to your data, when and where.

Family-Friendly

Manage your loved ones' health data alongside your own.

Get Started Today

Take control of your healthcare data with Fasten Connect.

Fasten Connect is a secure, real-time healthcare data sharing platform for providers and patients.
